snippet: Relief efforts after Hurricane Sandy occasionally provoked moments of friction and misunderstanding in a city long fractured by class, race, ethnicity, geography and culture.
abstract: Relief efforts after Hurricane Sandy occasionally provoked moments of friction and misunderstanding in a city long fractured by class, race, ethnicity, geography and culture; some privileged New Yorkers encountered a sense of class guilt as they volunteered to help their poorer neighbors, who in turn resented the possibility of voyeuristic interest in their plight.
lead_paragraph: Relief efforts after Hurricane Sandy occasionally provoked moments of friction and misunderstanding in a city long fractured by class, race, ethnicity, geography and culture.

headline.seo: After Hurricane Sandy, Helping Hands Also Expose a New York Divide
headline.main: Helping Hands Also Expose a New York Divide
headline.print_headline: Helping Hands Also Expose a New York Divide
